items.preText: Shakib is back on. He's bowled seven overs, 1 for 25 so far.
items.text: shorter length, he's back and punching this to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, he sits back and forces this with the turn to deep cover-point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: dropped at mid off by Soumya! Miller tried to loft this over mid off but hit it flatter, Soumya had to jump up on the circle but he got both hands to it and spilled it! They got two
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up again, he shuffles down and drives along the ground to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: skips down and mows this in the air flat past midwicket! It wasn't in control but he found the gap and it raced away
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to van der Dussen, FOUR runs

items.text: sliced high in the air over cover and long off runs around but can't quite get there! It was just out of reach , always spinning away, the throw in was untidy and the bowler failed to collect it and allowed another run
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to van der Dussen, 3 runs

items.text: darted into leg stump, he works this though square leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: very full, he drives inside out straight to cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, no run

items.text: tossed up, he drives this wide of cover, nicely timed into the gap to get a couple
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 2 runs

items.text: flatter and quicker on off, he's back and forcing this down the ground to long off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.preText: Saoirse: "Double the 30 over score? If that's the case it's going to be a tight finish. These two are destructive hitters, if they can build a strong platform South Africa should have the match"
items.text: fired in quickly to middle, he pushes firmly down to long on for one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: knee high full toss, Miller just casually punched it to the long off sweeper. Mosaddek got away with that one
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.preText: Mehidy returns again. He has three overs left.
items.text: tossed up outside off, he mistimes a drive but drags it towards long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on leg, he glances this fine, straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: angled into leg, he works this to the gap at square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: higher and slower outside off, he pushes with an open face to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, 1 run

items.text: flatter on off, he's back to create room, punching to long off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: he sweeps powerfully behind square! Got the length he wanted, drifting in to off and he sweeps hard with the angle to the gap behind square. Good shot. He waited and waited and was rewarded
items.postText: Varun Panthri: "With duminy and morris still there, miller and van der dussen should not worry about the RRR. Even they should look to accelerate only post 40th over. Till then keep getting risk free 6-7 runs every over. South Africa can easily get even 60 runs in last 5 if they are only 3 down."
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, FOUR runs

items.text: angled into leg, he's back and working this to deep square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: full on off, he drives firmly and neatly to long off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: flatter on off, he drives to long off
items.postText: Ribhu Sakib: "Can't really rely on Saifuddin and Mortaza on the death overs. They should be utilized now and the last 10 overs should be left for Mustafizur, Shakib, and Mehidy. "
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: flatter round arm into middle, he punches from the crease but Shakib can't cut it off at cover and it runs to long off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: nearly bowled him and it goes for four byes! Oh this was so close! It was shorter, he backed away to cut, he was beaten by extra bounce and it just went over the bails, past Mushfiqur's gloves and runs away !
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 4 byes

items.text: fuller on off, he drives neatly to long on
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.preText: Fergie: "Great to see a proper contest at last in this World Cup. Fascinating match." The Fiz is back. Mustafizur on
items.text: good length, angled across, 130kph, he square drives on the up to deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to van der Dussen, 1 run
